sentences.en: Almonds are used extensively in confectionery.
sentences.cn: 杏仁广泛地用于制糖果.

sentences.en: Although New Testament apocrypha go into these details, some quite extensively.
sentences.cn: 尽管在新约的伪经进一步详细地写这些细节, 一些还写得十分广阔.

sentences.en: Around here apple trees began to be planted extensively in 1953.
sentences.cn: 1953年这一带开始大规模种植苹果树.

sentences.en: Corn and cotton are extensively cultivated in this region.
sentences.cn: 这个地区普遍种植玉米和蔬菜.

sentences.en: Dr Alloway, from the University of Stirling in Scotland, has extensively studied working memory and believes it to be far more important to success and happiness than IQ.
sentences.cn: 来自苏格兰的斯特灵大学阿洛韦博士，已经广泛的研究“工作记忆”，并认为它是比智商更为重要对于成功和幸福来说。

sentences.en: He had worked extensively on the anatomy of living animals.
sentences.cn: 他在活体解剖方面经验丰富。

sentences.en: He has written extensively on the subject.
sentences.cn: 就这一题目他已经写了大量的东西.

sentences.en: Hydrogen is used extensively in industry for the production of ammonia.
sentences.cn: 氢气在工业上广泛用于制氨。

sentences.en: Latterly, he has written extensively about alternative medicine.
sentences.cn: 近来，他写了大量有关替代医学的文章。

sentences.en: Mark, however, needs to travel extensively with his varied business interests.
sentences.cn: 然而，马克因为各种生意需要频繁出差。

sentences.en: Models are used extensively in design, development, and the sciences.
sentences.cn: 模型在设计 、 开发和科学中广泛使用.

sentences.en: Of all these verbs the verb is the most extensively used.
sentences.cn: 在这些动词中应用范围最广的是这个动词.

sentences.en: The flumes are used extensively to measure watershed turnoff.
sentences.cn: 水槽广泛用于测量集水区的经流流量.

sentences.en: The interior has recently been extensively restored.
sentences.cn: 室内最近大规模地整修过.

sentences.en: The new rocket was extensively tested and debugged by the army.
sentences.cn: 这种新式火箭由军方进行了广泛的测试和调试。

sentences.en: The nylon has extensively been used for replacing the cotton now.
sentences.cn: 现在尼龙已被广泛地用来取代棉花.

sentences.en: The word'shell " is used extensively in the terminology of atomic physics.
sentences.cn: 在原子物理学的术语中, “ 壳层 ” 一词是经常使用的.

words.tran_cn: 延伸的；扩大的；长期的；广大的
延长；延期；扩大；伸展；电话分机
延伸；扩大；推广；伸出；给予；使竭尽全力；对…估价
